title: People Who Say Champions are OP
body: "I have 20 cs and the enemy Vayne with 500 cs can 2 shot me! RIOT NERF"

replies.body: yasuo needs buffs, over these feeding noobs, make it so they don't feed so much
or just make everyone an equal feeder with Yasuo.

Vayne is a terrible example considering she actually is broken as all fuck. 8% Max Health as TRUE DAMAGE is game breaking and needs a serious nerf to her Silver Bolts.
Hell even Doublelift the guy famous for being the best Vayne player in the world considers her broken and stupid.

If you're going to try to make a point like this you should actually focus on champs who people complain about for no good reason like Mordekaiser or Master Yi.
I wasn't specifically talking about Vayne, but the sole reason I made this thread was when I encountered this Sion in a normal game who would cry about literally everything that would kill him.
lol so tru like tanks so week at the moment what dose riot do we release a champ with 20% of current hp yes we fixed it

All that damage sure means a lot when you're in Tahm Kench's belly, or perma slowed/stunned by a team that uses their brain during champ select and takes some god damned CC.

She's not a broken champ, your team is silly for not taking the adequate champions to counter a fed ADC.
I LOVEEE VAYNE< NO NURF PLZZ <3 {{champion:67}} {{summoner:7}} {{summoner:7}} {{summoner:21}}
